alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 21 at 3:40AM PDT until March 21 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Francisco, San Francisco Bay Shoreline, San Francisco Peninsula Coast, East Bay Interior Valleys, Santa Clara Valley, and Northern Monterey Bay. * WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong and gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. Saturated soils can make it easier for trees to fall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds expected in the higher ridges and peaks of the East Bay Hills and Eastern Santa Clara Hills.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Eastern Santa Clara Hills; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
